lines.text: In other words, some days you eat the bone; other days the bone eats you.

[after eating ants]
This is absolute crap-o-ramma. Dead ants, live ants. I think I'm going to die.

[after witnessing the soldiers having just killed the adult male after it charged at them because they had drugged its mate]
You've any idea what you've just done? That was a one-of-a-kind specimen.
[Pointing at the adult female, which is still alive]

[During sex]
Go ahead and plant one on me.
OH! It French-kissed my nose! It kissed me!
Dragon breath. Get out of here!
